pullRequest.title: [insteon] remove support for multiple ports
pullRequest.bodyText: Multiple ports was implemented but never supported in the original insteonplm binding nor the current binding. This PR remove the unnecessary code for multiple ports.

commit.message:
[insteon] remove support for multiple ports

Signed-off-by: Rob Nielsen <rob.nielsen@yahoo.com>

nodes.bodyText: Any reason this is no longer evaluated at the end of the constructor? You should make sure not the leak any references of this until after you have finished essential configuration.
